coded_answer.p: I was very happy when your letter arrived, yesterday. This trip will be very important for me, that. That is why I am interested in travelling to the U.S.A as soon as possible.

I would like to travel onin July because I will be on my winter holidays, so I will not miss classes at school. I would really prefer to stay in a tentstent because I love sleeping outdoors and listening to the noises from outside.

I am going to tell you two activities that I would like to do while I will be at the Camp. Firstly I would be happy if you let me play tennis, because I have played it for four years and I do it well, and secondly I believe that singing could be interesting because I really like it and I have a beautiful voice.
I was wondering about the kind of clothes that I will have to wear and finally could you tell me how much money I will have to take?
I look for wardforward to receiving more news.

Hello! How are you? I'm writing because I know that you're interested in listeninghearing about my experience in whichwhen I enjoyed helping at a pop concert last month, perhaps. Perhaps in the future you'll be able to help too.
If you want to help at a pop concert you'll have to write downabout yourself in a competition as I did, then, if you win the organiser will phone you and you'll be able to help them.

At the concert I had to clear and organizedorganize all the people who were inthere, but at the end of the night I was able to talk with one of my favourite pop singersingers. I think that it was the experience I particularly liked most and which I will never forget.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
